data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: While a round-the-clock crew of six astronauts spent over a full year in a Mars simulation mission in an isolated mountain area of Hawaii, dozens of scientists at NASA headquarters in Florida were watching them closely. The ____ documented ____ astronaut's mood ____, blood ____, stress ____, and ____ patterns. This ____ the ____ mission ____ an ____ NASA project ____ the ____ uses ____ help ____ out ____ to ____ astronauts ____, happy, ____ healthy ____ long-duration missions. One team of observing scientists focused on how isolation affected the psychological health of mission's participants.

data.answer: 6名宇航员24小时不停地在夏威夷一个与世隔绝的山区执行火星模拟任务，与此同时，美国宇航局佛罗里达州总部的数十名科学家密切关注着他们。观众记录了宇航员的情绪波动、血压、压力水平和睡眠模式。这是美国宇航局正在进行的项目中的第六次任务，该议程用于帮助找出如何让宇航员在长期任务中保持孤独、快乐和健康。一组观察科学家专注于隔离是如何影响任务参与者的心理健康的。
